Articles.Content:
**ELECTRICAL PARTS\* V 1.6 !**  (Compatible with KSP 1.0.2)

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

**1.5 update note: PLEASE DELETE THE OLD MOD FILES BEFORE COPYING THE NEW ONE OR YOU'LL HAVE FIRESPITTER INCOMPATIBILITIES**

**\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_** 

**DEV THREAD** **** 
![PLFkUOG.png](http://i.imgur.com/PLFkUOG.png)**(give your ideas here)**

Tired of using a lot of stacked batteries to get more than 4k electric power ?, we thought about you !

Jeb is tired today, but you need him for a long trip on plane to the other side of the planet without refueling...let's just use the **fully electrical plane** ! ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

![oUKFjMX.png](http://i.imgur.com/oUKFjMX.png)

![7J4FpsU.png](http://i.imgur.com/7J4FpsU.png)

Tired of refueling your plane every time while electric motors are now reality in everydays uses ?

**Get your electrical plane with a whole cargobay for your baggage !**

![o788TST.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/o788TST.jpg)

![P2ASsot.png](http://i.imgur.com/P2ASsot.png)

[Download on kerbalstuff](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/724/Electrical%20parts%201.0)

Source on [GitHub](https://github.com/touzenesmy/Electrical_Engines/releases/)https://github.com/touzenesmy/Electrical_Engines/releases/

Hello everybody ! I'm making a new mod, electrical engines ! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif), I'll use this thread for it's **developement and the work in progress** posts !

**Installation :** 

1)Download the zip file from the link

2) Open your downloaded zip file

3) Delete the previous folder of the mod if you got one

4)Copy **ElectricalEngines** folder in your kerbalspaceprogram/Gamedata directory

5) ???

6) Profit !!!

**Features**

 **//// ALL THE ENGINES WORK ON EVE AND DUNA ///**

-Two 0.675 electric engines

-Two mk1 electric engines

-One 2m size electric engine.

-1m 0.675 BatteryTank

-1m and 2m BatteryTank for mk1 size

-1m BatteryTank for mk2 size

**Notes:**

If there is some part that you need, just mp me about it or leave a message here ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

**Changelog**

    v1.6- Compressed whole textures, mod passed from 35 Mb to less than 5 Mb - Added XT-005 engine- Added ST-005 engine- Added 0.675 battery tankv1.5- Changed the maxthrust of XT-02 from 450 to 500- Reduced the size of the parts on ram (the hardest part)in my opinion)- Retextured the whole parts for a more kerbalistic ones- Added/changed animations for better ones.v1.4Added parts:- batteryTank_1m_mk1- batteryTank_1m_mk2 - batteryTank_2m_mk1Fixes: - Fixed the XT-01 and XT-02 Engines weight balance. - Engines should be able to work on other planetes atmosphere nowv1.3parts:-Added ST01 electric spinner engine -Added 1x1.25 battery tank for jets on electrical powerFixes:-WHOLE remake of sounds, animations, and R&D-Reequilibration on thrust and electric consommation-Bugfixesv1.2-added XT02 electric enginev1.1.2-Fixed compatibility with ksp 1.0.2v1.1-added emissive to XT01, repaired fx effects, and reviewing the config file.v1.0-added engine XT01

Licence: MIT

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-03T22:11:59Z" title="06/03/2015 10:11  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 3, 2015</time> by touzenesmy**
Looks cool. Needs... A hotrockets emissive!

No because it doesn't "burn" any fuel that's why I didn't do it, it's just a turbine compressing air, but not enough to make it explode or be "red" that's why electrical engines have a poor thrust ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Very interesting! I'll be sure to download as soon as the download link works ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) currently giving a 401 error.

Gimme sec I'll see that

Go on, forgot to "publish" it, first mod so didn't knew I'll have to click on "publish" ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Going to sleep a bit, let you test it and read the feedbacks tomorrow

Good night !

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-01T04:13:34Z" title="05/01/2015 04:13  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 1, 2015</time> by touzenesmy**

> 
> No because it doesn't "burn" any fuel that's why I didn't do it, it's just a turbine compressing air, but not enough to make it explode or be "red" that's why electrical engines have a poor thrust ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Ah, but the blue emissives used by ion engines in the hotrockets configs look SO COOL!
You could always go on with a small animation of "white stuff" coming out of the engines, you know, the compressed air in the cold temperatures of the heights

Okey, I'll try to add it tonight ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Done, do you should have the smoke effect while using the engine, don't you ?

Noticed in the SPH the thrust is shown as NaN and power consumption as infinite

I'll fix that, it'll be released with the particles, maybe tomorrow (the emissive section of the engine is driving me a bit crazy ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) )

EDIT: here's what I've got in SPH, are you sure about it ? can I have a screenshot ? is someone else having the same issues ?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-02T03:22:38Z" title="05/02/2015 03:22  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 2, 2015</time> by touzenesmy**

Error on my part, it is in the tech tree display not SPH. Oops on that part. 

In the tech tree part display gave the strange values.

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/ssr0i8o2me127kx/screenshot0.png?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ssr0i8o2me127kx/screenshot0.png?dl=0)

I'm working on the part since yesterday, dunno if it's a change I did or not, but it looks fine now ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![LOEfkze.png](http://i.imgur.com/LOEfkze.png)
Just finished making some coloring effects, I'll show you this once I finish the particles one ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Looks cool! Simple enough and it works.

Here's the new screen, tell me what do you think about it ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

![9V7dBoE.png](http://i.imgur.com/9V7dBoE.png)

If you like it, I'll make this as the first update of the mod ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

10MB for the mesh files! That huge! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

folder structure in the zip with the update seems a bit off. Have to make a folder under GameData to add the contents of the zip to rather then straight copy. Could make it difficult for some users will lower folder structure experience.
